errorCachingMinTtl.description: Minimum amount of time you want HTTP error codes to stay in CloudFront caches before CloudFront queries your origin to see whether the object has been updated.

errorCode.description: 4xx or 5xx HTTP status code that you want to customize.

responseCode.description: HTTP status code that you want CloudFront to return with the custom error page to the viewer.

responsePagePath.description: Path of the custom error page (for example, `/custom_404.html`).
